data.lyric:
[ti:Roses ((imanbek Remix)(ghetto Lenny One Takes)(mp3cut.net)(1))]
[ar:SAINt JHN]
[al:你好中国]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Roses (imanbek Remix|ghetto Lenny One Takes|mp3cut.net|1) - SAINt JHN
[00:01.30]And I know you won't tell nobody no
[00:03.20]
[00:04.30]I might pull up flexing on these n***as like aerobics
[00:08.15]I might tell her girl you cute but balling that s**t gorgeous
[00:12.12]Standing on the table Rosé Rosé f**k the waters
[00:15.99]You know who the God is
[00:17.29]Turn up baby turn up when I turn it on
[00:19.83]
[00:21.51]You know how I get too lit when I turn it on
[00:23.96]
[00:25.41]Can't handle my behavior when I turn it on
[00:28.24]Too fast never ask if the life don't last
[00:30.43]Done been through
[00:32.11]F**k with a n***a raw this who
[00:34.42]Roses
[00:35.78]I walked in the corner with the body screaming dolo
[00:39.61]Never sold a bag but look like Pablo in a photo
[00:43.58]This gon' make 'em feel the way like Tony killed Manolo
data.trans:
[ti:Roses ((imanbek Remix)(ghetto Lenny One Takes)(mp3cut.net)(1))]
[ar:SAINt JHN]
[al:你好中国]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.30]我知道你不会告诉任何人的
[00:03.20]
[00:04.30]我可能不会再向这些伙计们炫耀
[00:08.15]我可能会告诉她 你很可爱 很有魅力 还很有气质
[00:12.12]玫瑰花插在装着水的花瓶里 放在桌上
[00:15.99]你知道谁是上帝
[00:17.29]现身吧 宝贝 现身吧 当我的心已经汹涌澎拜
[00:19.83]
[00:21.51]你知道我的爱火已经点燃 我的心已经汹涌澎拜
[00:23.96]
[00:25.41]我已经无法控制自己的行为 我的心已经汹涌澎拜
[00:28.24]我们进展太快了 无需多问 我们是否能永生
[00:30.43]尽管陪我就好
[00:32.11]与我尽情缠绵
[00:34.42]玫瑰花
[00:35.78]我走向角落 身体抑制不住地想要尖叫
[00:39.61]我从不卖** 但照片里的我看起来就像是***之王
[00:43.58]这让我联想到 Tony是怎么杀了Manolo的
